metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30598 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in moodle where global search results could include author information on some activities where a user may not otherwise have access to it.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
